summary: Email from Cindy Hopkins to an unknown recipient (possibly law enforcement or legal personnel) transmitting text files of Volume 1 and Volume 2 of IME (likely 'In My Experience' or similar deposition/statement) from a December 4, 2009 deposition. The email includes attachments and notes the document is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Cindy Hopkins
persons.context: Sender of the email who is providing text files and Eclipse files of her original notes from a December 4, 2009 deposition. She works at Robb Realty Atlanta.

persons.name: Hankins
persons.context: Recipient of the email (first name unclear, possibly 'rindv Hankins'), who is being sent deposition documents.

connections.description: Cindy Hopkins is sending deposition documents to Hankins, indicating a professional or legal document transfer relationship.

events.title: Deposition
events.description: A deposition took place on December 4, 2009, referenced in the email. Cindy Hopkins' original notes and text files from this deposition are being transmitted.

keyFacts: The email transmits text files of Volume 1 and Volume 2 of IME from a December 4, 2009 deposition.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
Cindy Hopkins, a real estate agent at Robb Realty Atlanta, is the source of the deposition notes and files.
